revised_title: Conversaziones: A Showcase of Scientific Discoveries and Innovations in 1962
tldr: The 1962 Conversaziones event at the Royal Society showcased various scientific exhibits, research, and innovations. Highlights included advancements in trachoma research, genetic code studies, optical maser technology, and fuel cell research. The event also featured historical exhibits, such as a model of a simple calculating machine, and demonstrations of new technologies like the field ion microscope and the N.P.L. Mekometer.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > History of Science
